TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDuplexContextChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject, class System.ServiceModel.IContextChannel, class System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject`1<class System.ServiceModel.IContextChannel>
Public Interface IDuplexContextChannel Implements IContextChannel, IExtensibleObject(Of IContextChannel)
type IDuplexContextChannel = interface interface IContextChannel interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject interface IExtensibleObject<IContextChannel>

Docs.summary: Defines the interface a client channel must implement to exchange messages in a duplex session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A duplex contract requires a session, because a context must be established to correlate the set of messages being sent between the client and the service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutomaticInputSessionShutdown { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutomaticInputSessionShutdown : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the input session is shutdown automatically.
Docs.value: if the input session is shutdown automatically; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the remote side initiates shutdown, the channel is automatically closed for the user if <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDuplexContextChannel.AutomaticInputSessionShutdown%2A> is set to `true`. Setting it to `false` instead allow the user to send some final messages to the remote side on its output session before closing the channel.

Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to close an output session on the client that has a specified time out and state object associated with it.
Docs.returns: The that references the asynchronous close operation.
